title: THIS is the offended culture that this horrendous reporting system has created, it's DISGUSTING.
body:
This is a 38 second video of the first part of the laning phase in a game, my support Karma is playing so far back that I can't even get to the wave to farm without getting harassed. He then goes afk for a few seconds to which I ping for help, and then say "wtf shield me dude." This guy replies "f u" "reported." The rest of the game he spams in all chat about reporting me.

This report system is an absolute fucking joke, these kind of fucktards get away with this shit all day long, but if you happen to get bothered by it Riot says "OH FUCK NO, YOU GOT MAD THAT SOMEONE COMPLETELY FUCKED OVER AND RUINED YOUR GAME? YOU'RE THE ONE WHO GETS BANNED." Not only is the game extremely shit right now, but I am at the point where just the offended people and this report culture that Riot has created in this game makes me not want to be around these type of kids. I can't believe people endorse any part of this as great when this is what it has created.

https://plays.tv/video/5ac5a2f4d784b20852/is-state-league-players-kids-in-usa-today-offended-culture-?oreferer=notifications

replies.body: I find it funny that right before you ask for her to shield you, Karma had literally just shielded you from Sona's Power Chord.
It's always the ones who think everyone else is "offended" who need the thicker skin.  The irony is very amusing.
Bruh she took q level 1 WHICH DOESN'T SHIELD and was letting the wave push into you. Learn the game before getting mad at other people.

> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=29NPHfRP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-05T04:23:40.048+0000)
>
> Bruh she took q level 1 WHICH DOESN'T SHIELD and was letting the wave push into you. Learn the game before getting mad at other people.

This. 

It's ok to pick off meta, but be smart about it.  You were playing Teemo into Sona and Lucian.  They **want** you to try to fight them in lane.  Your best bet was to wait for them to slip up or a gank... and it looks like your Karma knew that.

I do agree that your Karma took it... poorly.  But you could also have just reported her after the game for harassment and moved on.

You probably should look again. When Karma says "focus". You. Got. The. Shield.

It was completely consumed by the Sona's enhanced auto, but you can still see the shield there briefly.
She did shield you at level 2. You were too busy typing to notice it.
I realize she shielded me, but she afk'd.

>I realize she shielded me

No you didn't realize. Right after the shield you immediately berated karma to shield you. You got caught with your pants down with your mistaken indignation. You even made a post demanding someone to "look again", complaining that the karma was level two and didn't shield you. Too late to pretend now.

>but she afk'd.

She was staying back in the face of an enemy pair that can easily out duel you due to a wave advantage, level advantage, and pick advantage.

So were you banned for this or are you just mad that your support is terrible?


If it is the banned part

* In that case, I want to see full chatlog because people tend to lie a lot about what they say here.

If it is just a terrible support:

* she can't help it that she gets matched up with you either, it is like blaming a toddler for being thrown into a shark tank. They can't help it and they probably have a terrible time.

Also yes, I do think her reaction was overly sensitive at the start, but so was yours.

I don't know why you're so uptight about someone saying "You're Report" or asking for a report.
Because them saying that is considered as a harassment and punishable. You shouldn't be worried about the report. Unless that is, you're saying or doing something that can get you punished.

That's all people care about in this fucking game is who they are going to report. If they actually worried about getting better, they could improve... but they don't give a fuck. They want to ruin people's games and then when someone gets upset at them for going 0-10 or playing like this Karma, they get the happiness of getting a person banned AND ruining their night.

That's not true at all. I don't see it all that often because I keep a positive atmosphere in my games or mute the toxic player. You first need to have the self-control to play this game. This game isn't only about improving your gaming skills, but improving your overall experience and not only for yourself. This game is about improving your skills, improving your teamwork, improving your attitude and communication with your team.

If you can't do any of those things in those areas, then you're never going to improve in general in this game. Also, you need to improve your attitude before improving your skills, or you're not going to have an account to improve on anything.

As for the Karma, in her defense, she was at level 1. She got her Q first. She did then get her Shield and** she did shield** you as soon as she got it before you demanded her to shield you. But it really doesn't seem like Karma is the problem here. You seem like a very toxic individual.

It's hilarious how all these fanboys pop out in the Player Behavior section of the boards. Not one of them can admit that the behavior of this Karma is DESPICABLE and absolutely pathetic, asking her to play the game she signed up for warrants "f u reported." To these kids, lmfao yeah this community sucks ass.
If you want people to side with you try getting your own facts right first.

Karma was in the wrong for doing what she did, but you are here reading so we can tell you what you did wrong.

Sitting here critisizing Karma won't do anything positive for anyone.

Dude she used her shield and was playing back from a decent damage deal of sona lucian combo. Im lost as to why you are salty and mad at us when  **YOU** were the one coming here posting a video of what happen and we destroyed your argument. Learn the game kid, seems like you need to play normal's and watch your own game-play.
This is the same culture as before except 'omg reported' has been added.
Someone spending their chat petitioning for reports, which you seem VERY offended about, is also punished by the IFS.
no culture was created...people go around with a chip on their shoulder in general anymore...it's society.

ya pc and snowflake and world free of being offended culture has to go free country I say what I want

and for those who I have not yet offended I am sorry I will get to you soon
